thought: To craft a golden boots I need to make gold ingots, which require placing a gold block in the crafting table. Therefore I will place the gold block from slot 34 into slot 1 in the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
